attributes.action: Provide funding for Local councils to build more council homes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It's easy to forget about the Hidden homeless that live in our society, current social housing is not enough. Please Mr Blair bring back an active building program for rented accommodation provided by local authorities and not just shared ownership programs. Stop the mass sell of to housing trusts, direct funding to building and not just selling off old stock.

rejection.details: This petition overlaps with several already in existence - http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=council+homes
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
